modelName.description: The name of the model, one of baseline, analysis and report.

process.description: A Stox process of the appropriate model.

functionName.description: The name of the R function used by the process, of the form packageName:functionName.

processParameters.description: Parameters of the process independent of the function.

processData.description: Function outputs which are saved to the recipe file for reproducibility.

functionParameters.description: The parameters of the function which are not named by StoX data types. The functionParameters are defined and documented by the R function . For functions producing process data the first parameter, processData, is not included as part of the functionParameters.

functionInputs.description: The parameters of the function that named by StoX data types, thus denoting process output data to retrieve from previous processes in the model
